title: Aux Vivres
typeOfFood: Vegan, International, Western, Juice bar, Beer/Wine, Take-out, Bakery, Catering, Canadian
description: Vegan restaurant with a juice bar and bakery, operating since mid-2000s; renovated into more of a diner type atmosphere than its original commune-like setting. Offers soups, salad, sandwiches, bowls, burgers, smoothies, tea, daily special, and brunch on weekends. Next door to the restaurant it sells dishes to take home and food like tempeh and rice.
